verses.verse: When <S%H3588><s%> you sit <S%H3427><s%> down <S%H3427><s%> to dine <S%H9237><s%> with a ruler, <S%H4910><s%> Consider <S%H995><s%> carefully <S%H995><s%> what <S%H834><s%> is before <S%H6440><s%> you;
And put <S%H7760><s%> a knife <S%H7915><s%> to your throat, <S%H3930><s%> If <S%H518><s%> you are a man <S%H1167><s%> of [great] appetite. <S%H5315><s%>
Do not desire <S%H183><s%> his delicacies, <S%H4303><s%> For it is deceptive <S%H3577><s%> food. <S%H3899><s%>
Do not weary <S%H3021><s%> yourself to gain <S%H6238><s%> wealth, <S%H6238><s%> Cease <S%H2308><s%> from your consideration <S%H998><s%> [of it.]

When you set <S%H5774><s%> your eyes <S%H5869><s%> on it, it is gone. <S%H369><s%> For [wealth] certainly <S%H6213><s%> makes <S%H6213><s%> itself wings, <S%H3671><s%> Like an eagle <S%H5404><s%> that flies <S%H5774><s%> [toward] the heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
Do not eat <S%H9237><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> of a selfish <S%H7451><s%> <S%H5869><s%> man, <S%H7451><s%> Or desire <S%H183><s%> his delicacies; <S%H4303><s%>

For as he thinks <S%H8176><s%> within himself, <S%H5315><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> he is. He says <S%H559><s%> to you, "Eat <S%H398><s%> and drink! <S%H8354><s%>" But his heart <S%H3820><s%> is not with you.
You will vomit <S%H9513><s%> up the morsel <S%H6595><s%> you have eaten, <S%H398><s%> And waste <S%H7843><s%> your compliments. <S%H1697><s%> <S%H5273><s%>
Do not speak <S%H1696><s%> in the hearing <S%H241><s%> of a fool, <S%H3684><s%> For he will despise <S%H936><s%> the wisdom <S%H7922><s%> of your words. <S%H4405><s%>
Do not move <S%H5472><s%> the ancient <S%H5769><s%> boundary, <S%H1366><s%> Or go <S%H935><s%> into the fields <S%H7704><s%> of the fatherless; <S%H3490><s%>
For their Redeemer <S%H1350><s%> is strong; <S%H2389><s%> He will plead <S%H7378><s%> their case <S%H7379><s%> against <S%H854><s%> you.
Apply <S%H935><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> to discipline, <S%H4148><s%> And your ears <S%H241><s%> to words <S%H561><s%> of knowledge. <S%H1847><s%>

Do not hold <S%H4513><s%> back <S%H4513><s%> discipline <S%H4148><s%> from the child, <S%H5288><s%> Although <S%H3588><s%> you beat <S%H5221><s%> him with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> he will not die. <S%H4191><s%>
You shall beat <S%H5221><s%> him with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> And deliver <S%H5337><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>
My son, <S%H1121><s%> if <S%H518><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> is wise, <S%H2449><s%> My own heart <S%H3820><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> will be glad; <S%H8055><s%>
And my inmost <S%H3629><s%> being <S%H3629><s%> will rejoice, <S%H5937><s%> When your lips <S%H8193><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> what <S%H4339><s%> is right. <S%H4339><s%>
Do not let your heart <S%H3820><s%> envy <S%H7065><s%> sinners, <S%H2400><s%> But [live] in the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> always. <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3117><s%>
Surely <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> there <S%H3426><s%> is a future, <S%H319><s%> And your hope <S%H8615><s%> will not be cut <S%H3772><s%> off. <S%H3772><s%>
Listen, <S%H8085><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> and be wise, <S%H2449><s%> And direct <S%H833><s%> your heart <S%H3820><s%> in the way. <S%H1870><s%>
Do not be with heavy <S%H9352><s%> drinkers <S%H9352><s%> of wine, <S%H3196><s%> [Or] with gluttonous <S%H9105><s%> eaters <S%H9105><s%> of meat; <S%H1320><s%>

For the heavy <S%H9352><s%> drinker <S%H9352><s%> and the glutton <S%H9105><s%> will come <S%H3423><s%> to poverty, <S%H3423><s%> And drowsiness <S%H5124><s%> will clothe <S%H3847><s%> [a man] with rags. <S%H7168><s%>
Listen <S%H8085><s%> to your father who begot <S%H1><s%> you, And do not despise <S%H3205><s%> your mother <S%H936><s%> when <S%H517><s%> she is old. <S%H3588><s%>
Buy <S%H7069><s%> truth, <S%H571><s%> and do not sell <S%H4376><s%> [it,] [Get] wisdom <S%H2451><s%> and instruction <S%H4148><s%> and understanding. <S%H998><s%>
The father of the righteous <S%H1><s%> will greatly <S%H6662><s%> rejoice, <S%H1524><s%> And he who begets <S%H1523><s%> a wise <S%H3205><s%> son <S%H2450><s%> will be glad <S%H2450><s%> in him.
Let your father and your mother <S%H1><s%> be glad, <S%H517><s%> And let her rejoice <S%H8055><s%> who gave <S%H1523><s%> birth <S%H3205><s%> to you.
Give <S%H5414><s%> me your heart, <S%H3820><s%> my son, <S%H1121><s%> And let your eyes <S%H5869><s%> delight <S%H7521><s%> in my ways. <S%H1870><s%>
For a harlot <S%H2181><s%> is a deep <S%H6013><s%> pit, <S%H7745><s%> And an adulterous <S%H5237><s%> woman <S%H5237><s%> is a narrow <S%H9495><s%> well. <S%H875><s%>
Surely <S%H637><s%> she lurks <S%H693><s%> as a robber, <S%H2863><s%> And increases <S%H3254><s%> the faithless <S%H898><s%> among men. <S%H120><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> has woe <S%H190><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> has sorrow <S%H17><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> has contentions <S%H4066><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> has complaining <S%H7879><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> has wounds <S%H6482><s%> without <S%H2600><s%> cause <S%H2600><s%>? Who <S%H4310><s%> has redness <S%H2448><s%> of eyes <S%H5869><s%>?
Those who linger <S%H309><s%> long over <S%H5921><s%> wine, <S%H3196><s%> Those who go <S%H935><s%> to taste <S%H2713><s%> mixed <S%H4469><s%> wine. <S%H4469><s%>

Do not look <S%H7200><s%> on the wine <S%H3196><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> it is red, <S%H119><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> it sparkles <S%H5414><s%> <S%H5869><s%> in the cup, <S%H3563><s%> When it goes <S%H1980><s%> down <S%H1980><s%> smoothly; <S%H4339><s%>
At the last <S%H319><s%> it bites <S%H5391><s%> like a serpent, <S%H5175><s%> And stings <S%H9462><s%> like a viper. <S%H9494><s%>
Your eyes <S%H5869><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> strange <S%H2114><s%> things, <S%H2114><s%> And your mind <S%H3820><s%> will utter <S%H1696><s%> perverse <S%H8419><s%> things. <S%H8419><s%>

And you will be like one who lies <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> in the middle <S%H3820><s%> of the sea, <S%H3220><s%> Or like one who lies <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> on the top <S%H7218><s%> of a mast. <S%H2260><s%>

"They struck <S%H5221><s%> me, [but] I did not become <S%H2470><s%> ill; <S%H2470><s%> They beat <S%H1986><s%> me, [but] I did not know <S%H3045><s%> [it.] When <S%H4970><s%> shall I awake <S%H9516><s%>? I will seek <S%H1245><s%> another <S%H5750><s%> <S%H3254><s%> drink."
